title: Delayed prayer to avoid praying in front of people, is this shirk? #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: uh me and my friend had to pray at school and um one time in the area that we prayed there were people and um we didn't want to pray in front of them so we delayed the prayer and um is this like sh and if it is do I have to say my shahada publicly to him and can I continue to pray behind them no there's no problem in delaying the prayer as long as you pray it within the parameters of the prayer every prayer has a beginning and an end if you pray in between there's no problem in that whether you delayed it because there were so many people in the room you wanted to go to a a secluded place or where there is no much noise or where people would not look at you there's no shik in that none whatsoever
